content.rendered:
Heart Disease Nutrition Program

Book Free Consultation

Program Description

Our cardiovascular nutrition programme improves heart health and lowers the risk of cardiovascular disease through personalised nutrition and lifestyle changes based on the process of nutrition care process. Our registered dietitians create delicious meal plans that are tailored to your specific biochemistry and medical requirements. The program also includes exercise recommendations, stress management techniques, and other lifestyle modifications to improve cardiovascular health. You can improve your heart function, lower your blood pressure, and lower your risk of heart disease. Begin your journey to a healthier heart right now!

Key Benefits of
this Program

Lowered risk of developing heart disease:
A nutritious diet can help reduce the risk of developing heart disease. This is because a healthy diet can lower blood pressure, cholesterol levels, and inflammation, all of which are risk factors for heart disease.

Improved heart function:
Proper nutrition can help to improve heart function by promoting healthy blood vessels, increasing blood flow, and decreasing the workload on the heart. A diet high in omega-3 fatty acids, magnesium, potassium, and antioxidants can help support heart health and prevent or manage cardiovascular disease.

Reversal of heart disease:
According to studies, a nutritious diet low in fat and cholesterol and high in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and legumes can reverse heart disease by lowering cholesterol, improving blood pressure and endothelial function, reducing inflammation, and lowering blood pressure.

Price and package
details for program

Pakage Variation

It’s important to note that the cost of a kidney disease nutrition program may vary depending on factors such as the type and severity of kidney disease, other coexisting medical conditions, and the type and frequency of counselling and support needed.

Total Costing & Duration

Starting prices – INR 60,000

Duration – 3 Months

Read Success Stories
from Our Client

Book Free Consultation

@graph.name: Heart Disease, Cardiac diet Nutrition Program - Echha Joshi
@graph.description: Our cardiovascular nutrition programme improves heart health and lowers the risk of cardiovascular disease . We help in heart patients & Cardiac diet chart plans.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
